```{.r .cell-code}
source("test_pkg.R")
source("edit_log.R")
# to ensure that the lsiting doesn't fail.


dl <- download.packages("pan", destdir="packages",type="source",
                        method="wget")# wget was what solved this.. was getting binary versions


unlink("packages/pan")
untar(dl[,2], exdir = "packages", restore_times=FALSE)
writeLines("empty placeholder file","packages/pan/empty_output.Rout")
out <- test_pkg("pan", outDir="packages/pan", test_path="tests",
                   types=c("examples","tests")
                   )
```
